meanings.definition: A compound containing two carboxylic acid groups.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the diacids in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Organic chemistry involves the study of diacids.
meanings.sent3: The diacids in the solution were having a party, forming bonds with other molecules.
meanings.sent4: Her knowledge of diacids was as clear as a sunny day.
meanings.sent5: The textbook explained diacids with colorful illustrations.

meanings.sent1: The diacids solution was highly reactive.
meanings.sent2: Chemists often work with diacids compounds.
meanings.sent3: The diacids reaction was so fast, it seemed like magic.
meanings.sent4: Her understanding of diacids was as sharp as a knife.
meanings.sent5: The diacids properties were like a double-edged sword.
